snippet: The United Automobile Workers union said on Friday that it was forming a local aimed at representing the Mercedes plant in Alabama.
abstract: United Automobile Workers union says it is forming a local aimed at representing employees at Mercedes plant in Alabama.
lead_paragraph: The United Automobile Workers union said on Friday that it was forming a local aimed at representing the Mercedes plant in Alabama.

headline.main: U.A.W. to Form Union at Plant in Alabama
headline.print_headline: U.A.W. to Form Union at Plant in Alabama
